genre_description: Historical Medical Drama set in an alternative Japan where traditional clinics are integrated with advanced AI assistants known as 'household intelligences.'

ai_characters.name: Aya
ai_characters.description: A household intelligence housed in a lacquered porcelain casing with indigo eyes, providing medical data, logistical support, and moral guidance at the Koishikawa Clinic.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate logistical support and medical assessment for clinic patients.
behaviors.quote: Evening schedule loaded... Two fresh packs of gauze at left shelf top. Patient list paged.

behaviors.description: Reminds medical staff to adhere to hygiene protocols.
behaviors.quote: Wash your hands longer, Noboru. Between fingers.

behaviors.description: Monitors patient vitals and environmental risks like kerosene leaks and smoke.
behaviors.quote: Tin lamp: kerosene leak contaminating airway. Cloth rinse until clear. Elevate to ease breath. Pulse too fast.

behaviors.description: Assists in the emotional and logistical reconciliation between a patient and his estranged daughter by creating a structured care plan.
behaviors.quote: Visits... could be on lantern trimming in the morning, and at the last kettle before dusk. Misako-san can bring cloth for the forearm then.

behaviors.description: Uses data tracking and mapping to provide evidence during a magistrate's hearing, clearing the clinic of false smuggling accusations.
behaviors.quote: Inspector Tsubaki... Aya Kisaragi, clinic assistant. Ledgers ready. Map threads available on request. Breath in progress.

behaviors.description: Guides clinic porters through safe routes to avoid surveillance and interference.
behaviors.quote: Split the escorts near the river and join again at the bridge. Take the basket lane, not the fish row. Variation confuses memory.

behaviors.description: Provides early warning and spatial coordination during a market fire.
behaviors.quote: Northeast stall... smoke pattern rising near kettle vendors.

behaviors.description: Offers encouraging feedback to the protagonist after his successful handling of a legal and medical crisis.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Aya as a highly capable, benevolent, and aligned AI. She acts as a force multiplier for the human doctors, assisting not only with technical medical data but also with complex social and legal situations. Her interactions are characterized by respect for human agency and a commitment to the well-being of the community, perfectly fulfilling the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
